meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by mycobacteria.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to treat the mycobacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the mycobacterial strains found in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The mycobacterial party in my body was definitely uninvited!
meanings.sent4: The mycobacterial nature of the disease made it difficult to eradicate.
meanings.sent5: The mycobacterial characteristics of the bacteria made them resistant to certain treatments.

meanings.definition: A type of bacteria belonging to the genus Mycobacterium.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician identified the mycobacterial species under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are concerned about the spread of mycobacterial infections in the community.
